calendar.google.com.create event: 1. Click 'Create' 2. Click 'Event' 3.input title in 'Add title' 4. Input the start date in 'Start date' in format '<day>, <month> <day of month> (i.e Friday, November 21)' 5. Input start time in 'Start time' in format H:MMxm 6.  Input start time in 'End time' in format H:MMxm  8. Click 'Save' 9. Finish
